channel.title: Strength Emote!
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]FUCKING REMOVED CAUSE FUCKING NOOBS KEEP LEECHING. TBH, THE FUCKING 10 REP WANNABE'S WHO THINK THEY ARE COOL AND CAN CODE JUST CAUSE THEY CAN COPY AND PASTE SOMETHING, DOESN'T MEAN SHIT. SO YEAH, THE LEECHERS OF MOPARSCAPE RUINED YOUR CHANCE AT GETTING 1 FREE SKILLCAPE EMOTE! CONGRATS!
P.S.
IF ANYONE RE-RELEASES THIS I WILL DEMAND IT GETS REMOVED. YOU NOOBS WANTED THE EMOTE, I POSTED IT. LEAST YOU COULD HAVE DONE WAS FOLLOW WHAT I SAID WHEN I SAID POST BACK.
SO YES, CJ, YOU CAN LOCKS THIS NOW.
LAST NOTE:
IF YOU WANT THE EMOTE YOU CAN PM ME AND I MIGHT GIVE IT TO YOU, BUT YOU HAVE TO OFFER PROOF THAT YOU ARE NOT GOING TO LEECH IT AND CALL IT YOUR OWN[/size][/b]

item.title: Strength Emote!

item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:10, topic:323839”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=420243.msg3087765#msg3087765 date=1262639769]
IT LOADS PERFECTLY FINE IN MY CLIENT…
[/quote]

I would like proof.[/quote]

CJ, I don’t joke when it comes to skillcape emotes…I will make a video of it to prove it to you…

item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

WHAT EVER, DELETE THIS TOPIC…

IDC ANYMORE, I JUST GAVE YOU THE DAMN .DAT FILE ALL THE SC EMOTES ARE IN…IT LOADS PERFECTLY FINE IN MY CLIENT…

GET SOME BRAINS THEN WHEN YOU REALIZE YOU ALL MADE A MISTAKE, YOU CAN GO DIE IN A FUCKING HOLE

item.title: Strength Emote!
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:7, topic:323839”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=420243.msg3087366#msg3087366 date=1262607800]

Everyone knows 1290.dat contains all the good stuff, but [quote author=badger41 link=topic=420243.msg3087359#msg3087359 date=1262607107]
1290.dat is too big for the client to buffer.

So, this topic, pointless, anyone in agreement?
[/quote]

CJ, this topic isn’t pointless… Everyone wants the damn skillcape emotes.

I’m not going to spoonfeed people skillcape emotes. Your going to tell me people can be lazy on Moparscape?

I remember when I first started Cocoa and you both told me the Moparscape communitty doesn’t spoon-feed. Why are you guys telling me to spoon-feed now?
[/quote]

If you were to tell us how to actually load the 1290.dat file into the client without crashing it, then that wouldn’t be spoon feeding, whereas if you were to do that, plus provide all the code, all the frames which go into class20.java, plus the gfx models and code, then yeah, that would be spoonfeeding.[/quote]

this

and this topic IS pointless, because you are telling us 1290 is skillcape emotes, and alot of people already know this and the fact that the client cant load 1290 without modification, and thats what we want to know, how to cut/modify it so the client CAN load it.

Read full topic

item.title: Strength Emote!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:

[/quote]

So, this topic, pointless, anyone in agreement?
[/quote]

CJ, this topic isn’t pointless… Everyone wants the damn skillcape emotes.

I’m not going to spoonfeed people skillcape emotes. Your going to tell me people can be lazy on Moparscape?

I remember when I first started Cocoa and you both told me the Moparscape communitty doesn’t spoon-feed. Why are you guys telling me to spoon-feed now?[/quote]

If you were to tell us how to actually load the 1290.dat file into the client without crashing it, then that wouldn’t be spoon feeding, whereas if you were to do that, plus provide all the code, all the frames which go into class20.java, plus the gfx models and code, then yeah, that would be spoonfeeding.

item.title: Strength Emote!
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

the elve age:

What the fuck is this…? A joke? Where r the damn mods.

I have an emote teller on RS.

It tells me what emote I’m doing, I have a few 99’s on RS…The animation file is 1290.dat

If you open it with RSPoser and use a char with cape model, you’ll see the emote. I’m not releasing any codes with frams or anything, stop being fucking lazy and create your own…
